SD.16 StructureDefinition-narrative-uv-ips

Conformance resource variables defined here

SD.16.1 Formal Views of Profile Content

Description of Profiles, Differentials, and Snapshots.

The official URL for this profile is: http://hl7.org/fhir/ips/StructureDefinition/narrative-uv-ips

Published on Thu Mar 08 06:31:40 MST 2018 as a draft by .

This profile builds on Narrative

Summary

Extensions

This structure refers to these extensions:

  • http://hl7.org/fhir/ips/StructureDefinition/translateddiv-uv-ips

Differential View

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Narrative 0..*
translateddiv-uv-ips 0..*(Complex)Translated Narrative
URL: http://hl7.org/fhir/ips/StructureDefinition/translateddiv-uv-ips

Documentation for this format

Snapshot View

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Narrative I0..*A human-readable formatted text, including images
id 0..1stringxml:id (or equivalent in JSON)
translateddiv-uv-ips 0..*(Complex)Translated Narrative
URL: http://hl7.org/fhir/ips/StructureDefinition/translateddiv-uv-ips
status 1..1codegenerated | extensions | additional | empty
Binding: NarrativeStatus (required)
div I1..1xhtmlLimited xhtml content
txt-1: The narrative SHALL contain only the basic html formatting elements and attributes described in chapters 7-11 (except section 4 of chapter 9) and 15 of the HTML 4.0 standard, <a> elements (either name or href), images and internally contained style attributes
txt-2: The narrative SHALL have some non-whitespace content

Documentation for this format

Downloads: StructureDefinition: (XML, JSON), Schema: XML Schematron
